database.name: SnapAnalyst
database.description: SNAP Quality Control database with normalized household, member, and QC error data. Data is structured to eliminate the wide-format CSV issue (1200+ columns reduced to ~100 columns across 3 tables).
database.purpose: Enable analysis of SNAP (food stamps) quality control reviews to understand benefit accuracy, household characteristics, income sources, and program errors.
database.data_source: FNS SNAP Quality Control Public Use Files (FY2021, FY2022, FY2023)

notes.max_members: FY2021-2022: up to 16 members per household; FY2023: up to 17 members
notes.max_errors: Up to 9 QC errors per household (all years)
notes.code_compatibility: Code mappings are compatible across all fiscal years (superset approach)

case_classification_codes.description: Case classification for error rate calculation
case_classification_codes.2: Excluded from error rate calculation—processed by SSA worker
case_classification_codes.3: Excluded from error rate calculation, as designated by FNS (for example, demonstration project, simplified SNAP)

expedited_service_codes.description: Whether household received expedited SNAP benefits
expedited_service_codes.1: Entitled to expedited service and received benefits within Federal time frame
expedited_service_codes.2: Entitled to expedited service but did not receive benefits within Federal time frame

categorical_eligibility_codes.0: Unit not categorically eligible for benefits
categorical_eligibility_codes.1: Unit reported as categorically eligible for benefits and therefore not subject to SNAP income or asset tests
categorical_eligibility_codes.2: Unit recoded as categorically eligible after being identified as pure cash PA or as meeting State-specified criteria for BBCE

error_finding_codes.description: Impact of variance on benefits (error finding)

snap_affiliation_codes.1: Eligible member of SNAP case under review and entitled to receive benefits
snap_affiliation_codes.2: Eligible SNAP participant in another unit, not currently under review
snap_affiliation_codes.4: Member is ineligible noncitizen and not participating in State-funded SNAP
snap_affiliation_codes.5: Member not paying/cooperating with child support agency
snap_affiliation_codes.9: Member ineligible to participate due to disqualification or failure to meet work requirements
snap_affiliation_codes.11: Fleeing felon or parole and probation violator
snap_affiliation_codes.18: Member is ineligible noncitizen and participating in State-funded SNAP
snap_affiliation_codes.19: Individual in the home but not part of SNAP household

element_codes.description: Type of variance element (what area had the problem)
element_codes.211: Bank accounts or cash on hand
element_codes.350: Child support payments received from absent parent

nature_codes.description: Nature of each variance (what went wrong)
nature_codes.12: Eligible person(s) with no income, resources, or deductible expenses excluded
nature_codes.15: Eligible person(s) with deductible expenses excluded
nature_codes.32: Failed to consider or incorrectly considered income of ineligible member
nature_codes.35: Unreported source of income (do not use for change in employment status)
nature_codes.36: Rounding used/not used or incorrectly applied
nature_codes.37: All income from source known but not included
nature_codes.38: More income received from this source than budgeted
nature_codes.39: Employment status changed from unemployed to employed
nature_codes.40: Employment status changed from employed to unemployed
nature_codes.41: Change only in amount of earnings
nature_codes.42: Conversion to monthly amount not used or incorrectly applied
nature_codes.43: Averaging not used or incorrectly applied
nature_codes.44: Less income received from this source than budgeted
nature_codes.45: Cost of doing business not used or incorrectly applied
nature_codes.46: Failed to consider/anticipate month with extra pay date
nature_codes.52: Deduction that should have been included was not
nature_codes.53: Deduction included that should not have been
nature_codes.54: Incorrect standard used (not as a result of change in unit size or move)
nature_codes.64: Incorrect amount used resulting from change in residence
nature_codes.65: Incorrect standard used resulting from change in unit size
nature_codes.77: Unit not entitled to transitional benefits
nature_codes.80: Improper prorating of initial month's benefits
nature_codes.97: Not required to be reported or acted upon based on time frames and reporting requirements
nature_codes.111: Child support payment(s) not considered or incorrectly applied for initial month(s) of eligibility
nature_codes.112: Retained child support payment(s) not considered or incorrectly applied
nature_codes.120: Variance/errors resulting from noncompliance with this means-tested public assistance program
nature_codes.124: Variances resulting from use of automatic Federal information exchange system
nature_codes.127: Pass-through not considered or incorrectly applied
nature_codes.301: Unit improperly participating under retrospective budgeting
nature_codes.302: Unit improperly participating under prospective budgeting
nature_codes.303: Unit improperly participating under monthly reporting
nature_codes.304: Unit improperly participating under quarterly reporting
nature_codes.305: Unit improperly participating under semiannual reporting
nature_codes.306: Unit improperly participating under change reporting
nature_codes.307: Unit improperly participating under status reporting
nature_codes.308: Unit improperly participating under 5 hour reporting
nature_codes.309: Unit improperly participating in transitional benefits

agency_responsibility_codes.description: Primary cause of variance (agency vs client responsibility)
agency_responsibility_codes.2: Incomplete or incorrect information provided; agency not required to verify
agency_responsibility_codes.3: Information withheld by client (case referred for IPV investigation)
agency_responsibility_codes.4: Incorrect information provided by client (case referred for IPV investigation)
agency_responsibility_codes.7: Inaccurate information reported by collateral contact
agency_responsibility_codes.8: Acted on incorrect Federal computer match information not requiring verification
agency_responsibility_codes.12: Reported information disregarded or not applied
agency_responsibility_codes.14: Agency failed to follow up on inconsistent or incomplete information
agency_responsibility_codes.15: Agency failed to follow up on impending changes
agency_responsibility_codes.16: Agency failed to verify required information

discovery_method_codes.1: Variance clearly identified from case record (not automated match)
discovery_method_codes.2: Variance clearly identified from case record (automated match)
discovery_method_codes.5: Financial institution, insurance company, or other business
discovery_method_codes.7: Government agency or public records, not automated match
discovery_method_codes.8: Government agency or public records, automated match

element_categories.description: Categories for element codes to group related error types

agency_responsibility_types.description: Classification of agency vs client responsibility codes

abawd_status_codes.1: Not an able-bodied adult without dependents (ABAWD)
abawd_status_codes.3: ABAWD meeting work requirements at 7 CFR 273.24(a)(1)
abawd_status_codes.4: ABAWD meeting work requirements (in 3 months of eligibility)
abawd_status_codes.8: Ineligible householder also coded as an eligible member of the SNAP unit

citizenship_status_codes.3: Legal permanent resident with 40 quarters work/military/5 years residency/disability/under 18
citizenship_status_codes.5: Person admitted as refugee, granted asylum, or given stay of deportation
citizenship_status_codes.7: Noncitizen legally in U.S. not meeting eligibility but income/resources considered
citizenship_status_codes.8: Other ineligible legal noncitizen (visitor, tourist, student, diplomat)

race_ethnicity_codes.description: Race and ethnicity of household member
race_ethnicity_codes.1: Racial/ethnic data not available (application not found)
race_ethnicity_codes.3: American Indian or Alaska Native (Not Hispanic)
race_ethnicity_codes.6: Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander (Not Hispanic)
race_ethnicity_codes.8: American Indian or Alaska Native and White (Not Hispanic)
race_ethnicity_codes.10: Black or African American and White (Not Hispanic)
race_ethnicity_codes.11: American Indian or Alaska Native and Black or African American (Not Hispanic)
race_ethnicity_codes.13: Hispanic or Latino and American Indian or Alaska Native
race_ethnicity_codes.15: Hispanic or Latino and Black or African American
race_ethnicity_codes.16: Hispanic or Latino and Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander
race_ethnicity_codes.18: Hispanic or Latino and American Indian or Alaska Native and White
race_ethnicity_codes.19: Hispanic or Latino and Asian and White
race_ethnicity_codes.20: Hispanic or Latino and Black or African American and White
race_ethnicity_codes.21: Hispanic or Latino and American Indian or Alaska Native and Black or African American
race_ethnicity_codes.22: Hispanic or Latino and multiple races (other combinations)

relationship_codes.5: Other related person (brother, sister, niece, nephew, grandchild)

work_registration_codes.2: Federal exemption - physically or mentally unfit for employment
work_registration_codes.3: Federal exemption - care of child under 6 or incapacitated person
work_registration_codes.4: Federal exemption - working/earning equivalent of 30 hours per week
work_registration_codes.6: Should have been registered but was not (FY2021 legacy code)

employment_status_type_codes.1: Not in labor force and not looking for work

homelessness_codes.2: Homeless, not receiving homeless shelter allowance

reporting_system_codes.1: Change reporting with $125 change in earned income
reporting_system_codes.2: Change reporting with change of wage rate, salary, or employment status
reporting_system_codes.3: 5-hour change in hours worked expected to continue over a month
reporting_system_codes.4: Simplified reporting (exceeding 130% of income poverty guidelines)

ssi_cap_codes.description: SSI Combined Application Project (SSI-CAP) participation status
ssi_cap_codes.1: SSI-CAP case with standard shelter expenses
ssi_cap_codes.2: SSI-CAP case with standard benefit, consistent with program rules
ssi_cap_codes.3: SSI-CAP case with standard benefit, inconsistent with program rules
ssi_cap_codes.4: NYSCAP case (New York SSI-CAP, added FY2022)

households.description: Core household case data. Each row represents one SNAP household case from quality control review.
households.source_notes: Derived from SNAP QC FY2023 Public Use File wide-format CSV with 1200+ columns

case_id.description: SNAP household identification number (row number from source file - unique unit identifier, part of composite primary key)
case_id.notes: Natural primary key from source data

fiscal_year.description: Fiscal year (part of composite primary key)
fiscal_year.notes: Part of composite primary key to support multiple years

case_classification.description: Case classification for error rate calculation

fiscal_year.description: Fiscal year of the quality control review
fiscal_year.source_field: Derived from YRMONTH or specified during data load
fiscal_year.notes: Not explicitly in CSV - determined from year_month or load parameter

state_code.description: FIPS code for State or territory (numeric)

year_month.description: Sample year and month in YYYYMM format

raw_benefit.description: Reported SNAP benefit received (before QC corrections)

amount_error.description: Dollar error in benefits (always positive/absolute). Direction from status: 2=Overissuance, 3=Underissuance

maximum_benefit.description: Maximum benefit amount for unit size and region

net_income.description: Final net countable income after deductions

raw_household_size.description: Reported number of people in household

num_elderly.description: Number of elderly individuals in unit (age 60+)

num_disabled.description: Number of non-elderly individuals with disabilities

codes.1: Entitled and received within Federal time frame
codes.2: Entitled but did NOT receive within time frame

tanf_indicator.description: Indicator of TANF receipt for unit

liquid_resources.description: Countable liquid assets under State rules

real_property.description: Countable real property under State rules

total_assets.description: Total countable assets under State rules

last_certification_date.description: Date case was certified/recertified in YYYYMMDD format

gross_test_result.description: Indicator of passing gross income test

net_test_result.description: Indicator of passing net income test

homeless_deduction.description: Amount of homeless household shelter deduction

created_at.notes: Not in source CSV - database audit field

updated_at.notes: Not in source CSV - database audit field

household_members.description: Individual household member data. Each household has 1-17 members.
household_members.source_notes: Person-level data extracted from columns with suffix 1-17 in source CSV

case_id.description: SNAP household identification number (part of composite primary key)
case_id.notes: Part of composite primary key and foreign key to households

fiscal_year.description: Fiscal year (part of composite primary key)
fiscal_year.notes: Part of composite primary key and foreign key to households

member_number.description: Member position in household (1-17, part of composite primary key)
member_number.source_field: Derived from column suffix (AGE1→1, AGE2→2, etc.)
member_number.notes: Extracted from the 'i' in source field names like AGEi, WAGESi

snap_affiliation_code.description: SNAP case affiliation - member's participation status

codes.1: Eligible member entitled to receive benefits
codes.9: Ineligible due to work requirement failure
codes.19: Individual in home but not part of SNAP household

total_earned_income.description: Sum of all earned income sources (calculated field)
total_earned_income.notes: Not in source CSV - computed from member income fields

total_unearned_income.description: Sum of all unearned income sources (calculated field)
total_unearned_income.source_field: Calculated: social_security + ssi + unemployment + tanf + child_support + veterans_benefits + workers_compensation
total_unearned_income.notes: Not in source CSV - computed from member income fields

total_income.notes: Not in source CSV - computed field

qc_errors.description: Quality Control errors (variances) found during review. Up to 9 errors per household.
qc_errors.source_notes: Error data extracted from columns with suffix 1-9 in source CSV

case_id.description: SNAP household identification number (part of composite primary key)
case_id.notes: Part of composite primary key and foreign key to households

fiscal_year.description: Fiscal year (part of composite primary key)
fiscal_year.notes: Part of composite primary key and foreign key to households

error_number.description: Error sequence number for this household (1-9, part of composite primary key)
error_number.source_field: Derived from column suffix (ELEMENT1→1, ELEMENT2→2, etc.)
error_number.notes: Extracted from the 'i' in source field names like ELEMENTi, NATUREi

element_code.description: Variance element - type of problem area

nature_code.description: Nature of variance - what went wrong

occurrence_date.description: Variance occurrence date in YYYYMM format

codes.2: At time of most recent action

created_at.notes: Not in source CSV - database audit field

column_display_formats._description: Display format hints for UI table rendering. Format types: integer (whole number with commas), rawint (whole number WITHOUT commas for codes/dates), year (year without commas), currency ($ with 2 decimals), weight (4 decimals), text (as-is), boolean, datetime

year._description: Display as year without comma separators (e.g., 2023 not 2,023)

rawint._description: Display as whole number WITHOUT comma separators - for codes, dates in YYYYMMDD/YYYYMM format

integer._description: Display as whole numbers WITH comma separators - for counts and quantities

currency._description: Display with 2 decimal places for dollar amounts. Also matches aggregate columns like avg_*, average_*, sum_*, total_* containing income/benefit/amount keywords.

weight._description: Display with 4 decimal places for statistical weights
